entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023
